sentences.english: Kevin Huang and David Lin are classmates.
sentences.chinese: 黄课文和林大卫是同班同学。

sentences.english: Jack got the cold shoulder from his classmates after he double-crossed his best friend.
sentences.chinese: 自从杰克出卖了他最好的朋友后，同班同学都冷落他。

sentences.english: Kitty and her classmates have a project.
sentences.chinese: 基蒂和她的同班同学有一项工程。

sentences.english: Some of my class-mates are good singers.
sentences.chinese: 我同班同学中有些人歌唱得很好。

sentences.english: Obama and the rest of his homeroom class pose for a portrait for the 1979 school yearbook.
sentences.chinese: Obama和同班同学在1979年校鉴中的合影。

sentences.english: Kevin Huang and David Lin are classmates.
sentences.chinese: 黄克文和林大卫是同班同学。

sentences.english: She backed off from the debate when she saw her classmates were getting angry.
sentences.chinese: 她见她的同班同学要生气了，就中断了辩论。

sentences.english: Bill was also well ahead of his classmates in mathematics and science.
sentences.chinese: 在数学和自然方面比尔比同班同学也更胜一筹。

sentences.english: Some cadres' children take advantage of their parents' power to bully their classmates at school.
sentences.chinese: 某些干部子女仗势欺人，在学校欺负同班同学。

sentences.english: I must catch up with my class.
He was in my father’s class 59.
sentences.chinese: 他和我爸是59级同班同学。

sentences.english: I am particularly good relationship with Li Jian, we are college classmate.
sentences.chinese: 我跟李健关系就特别好，我们是大学同班同学。

sentences.english: He surpasses all his classmates in intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 他在智力上胜过他的所有同班同学。
她落后于她的同班同学。

sentences.english: Tian Shan and Liu Bing are classmates .
sentences.chinese: 田珊和刘冰是同班同学。

sentences.english: She broke off with her old classmates when she went away to college.
sentences.chinese: 她上大学后，就和原来的同班同学断绝了往来。

definition: to be in the same class/to be in the same squad/classmate
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
the prettiest girl in the class
(dialect) close childhood friend whom one grew up with/a couple who grew up as childhood friends
good friend/(slang) a visit from Aunt Flo (menstrual period)
the prettiest girl in the school (see also 校草[xiao4 cao3])/school beauty queen/campus belle/prom queen
to get to know each other/acquaintance
lit. green plums and hobby-horse (idiom)/fig. innocent children's games/childhood sweethearts/a couple who grew up as childhood friends

pinyin: Zhong1 yang1 Xi4 ju4 Xue2 yuan4
Bei3 jing1 Dian4 ying3 Xue2 yuan4

definition: to gain entry by passing an exam/to be admitted to (a college etc)
